agency.title: Tendências de Marketing para 2023!
agency.description: Neste corte do Webinar 'Captação de Leads e Atendimento - Desafios no digital', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) e Fausto Reichert (Piperun) falam sobre como a Leadster define suas metas e apresentam novas estratégias para testar em 2023.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the webinar 'Lead Generation and Customer Support - Challenges in the digital world', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) and Fausto Reichert (Piperun) discuss how Leadster defines its goals and present new strategies to test in 2023.

agency.title: A importância do Benchmark e Networking na estratégia de Marketing Digital
agency.titleEn: The importance of Benchmarking and Networking in the Digital Marketing strategy.
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) fala sobre a importância de acompanhar números do mercado e fazer networking para sua estratégia de Marketing Digital.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) talks about the importance of tracking market metrics and networking for your Digital Marketing strategy.

agency.title: Como surgiu a Leadster e os desafios de Empreender na área de Tecnologia
agency.titleEn: How Leadster came to be and the challenges of Entrepreneurship in the Technology field.
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) apresenta o histórico da Leadster, primeira plataforma de Marketing Conversacional do Brasil, e fala sobre os desafios de empreender na área de tecnologia.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) presents the history of Leadster, the first Conversational Marketing platform in Brazil, and talks about the challenges of entrepreneurship in the technology field.

agency.title: Estratégias de curto e longo prazo no Marketing Digital
agency.titleEn: Short and long-term strategies in Digital Marketing.
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) explica importância de encontrar um equilíbrio entre estratégias de curto e longo prazo no Marketing Digital.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) explains the importance of finding a balance between short and long-term strategies in Digital Marketing.

agency.title: Mercado, Produto, Modelo e Canais - O Mix de variáveis do Marketing Digital
agency.titleEn: Market, Product, Model, and Channels - The Mix of variables in Digital Marketing.
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) demonstra como o mix de variáveis do Marketing Digital afeta o seu negócio.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) demonstrates how the mix of variables in Digital Marketing affects your business

agency.title: Model-Channel Fit: Entenda em quais canais atuar a partir do seu Modelo de Negócio
agency.titleEn: Model-Channel Fit: Understand which channels to operate based on your Business Model.
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) explica o conceito de 'model-channel fit', que revela em quais canais você poderá atuar a partir do seu modelo de negócio.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) explains the concept of 'model-channel fit', which reveals in which channels you can operate based on your business model.

agency.title: Product-Market Fit: O que é e por que sua Startup precisa dele para sobreviver?
agency.titleEn: Product-Market Fit: What it is and why your Startup needs it to survive?
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) fala sobre a importância de ter um produto que atenda uma necessidade real de mercado e tenha viabilidade técnica e econômica - o famoso 'product-market fit'.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) talks about the importance of having a product that meets a real market need and has technical and economic viability - the famous 'product-market fit'.

agency.title: Startups: O que fazer após captar os primeiros clientes?
agency.titleEn: Startups: What to do after acquiring the first customers?
agency.description: Neste corte da mentoria 'Os passos do Marketing Digital para Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) revela os próximos passos para sua startup após a conquista dos primeiros clientes.
agency.descriptionEn: In this cut of the mentoring session 'The Steps of Digital Marketing for Startups', Gustavo Luby (Leadster) reveals the next steps for your startup after acquiring the first customers.
